verses.verse: And it came to pass,<WH1961> that after<WH6256> the year<WH8141> was expired,<WH8666> at the time<WH6256> that kings<WH4428> go out<WH3318> to battle, Joab<WH3097> led forth<WH5090> <WH853> the power<WH2428> of the army,<WH6635> and wasted<WH7843> <WH853> the country<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and came<WH935> and besieged<WH6696> <WH853> Rabbah.<WH7237> But David<WH1732> tarried<WH3427> at Jerusalem.<WH3389> And Joab<WH3097> smote<WH5221> <WH853> Rabbah,<WH7237> and destroyed<WH2040> it.

And David<WH1732> took<WH3947> <WH853> the crown<WH5850> of their king<WH4428> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> his head,<WH7218> and found<WH4672> it to weigh<WH4948> a talent<WH3603> of gold,<WH2091> and there were precious<WH3368> stones<WH68> in it; and it was set<WH1961> upon<WH5921> David's<WH1732> head:<WH7218> and he brought also exceeding much spoil out<WH3318> <WH3966> <WH7235> <WH7998> of the city.<WH5892>

And he brought out<WH3318> the people<WH5971> that<WH834> were in it, and cut<WH7787> them with saws,<WH4050> and with harrows<WH2757> of iron,<WH1270> and with axes.<WH4050> Even so<WH3651> dealt<WH6213> David<WH1732> with all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983> And David<WH1732> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH310> this,<WH3651> that there arose<WH5975> war<WH4421> at Gezer<WH1507> with<WH5973> the Philistines;<WH6430> at which time<WH227> Sibbechai<WH5444> the Hushathite<WH2843> slew<WH5221> <WH853> Sippai,<WH5598> that was of the children<WH4480> <WH3211> of the giant:<WH7497> and they were subdued.<WH3665>

And there was<WH1961> war<WH4421> again<WH5750> with<WH854> the Philistines;<WH6430> and Elhanan<WH445> the son<WH1121> of Jair<WH3265> slew<WH5221> <WH853> Lahmi<WH3902> the brother<WH251> of Goliath<WH1555> the Gittite,<WH1663> whose spear<WH2595> staff<WH6086> was like a weaver's<WH707> beam.<WH4500>

And yet again<WH5750> there was<WH1961> war<WH4421> at Gath,<WH1661> where was<WH1961> a man<WH376> of great stature,<WH4060> whose fingers and toes<WH676> were four<WH702> and twenty,<WH6242> six<WH8337> on each hand, and six<WH8337> on each foot: and he<WH1931> also<WH1571> was the son<WH3205> of the giant.<WH7497>
But when he defied<WH2778> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> Jonathan<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Shimea<WH8092> David's<WH1732> brother<WH251> slew<WH5221> him.
These <WH411> were born<WH3205> unto the giant<WH7497> in Gath;<WH1661> and they fell<WH5307> by the hand<WH3027> of David,<WH1732> and by the hand<WH3027> of his servants.<WH5650>
